categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: During the Battle of Ryloth, the Galactic Republic maintained an Outer Rim garrison on Ryloth led by Jedi General Ima-Gun Di and Clone Captain Keeli. The garrison wore brown armor to symbolize their unit. After the Outer Rim garrison was trapped in a mountain range, the garrison made a last stand on a passageway so that the Twi'lek Resistance could escape with their families. The garrison was destroyed, and Di and Keeli were killed.
The clones of this outfit had dark brown markings on their armor.
